transcript:
Customer: Kya dikhta tha?
Extension wala na?
Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan Rajan ji good evening sir.
Customer: Haan good evening hello.
Executive: Haan Imran baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se kaise hai sir aap?
Hello.
Customer: Main bhi tum bolo sir.
Executive: Actually sir maine call kiya tha sir ek feedback aapka receive hua tha sir not satisfied ka sir. Aapka discussion hua hoga aapke account manager ke sath hai na sir?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To wahi jaanna chah raha sir ki kahan pe problem aa rahi hai bataiye sir kaise help kar sakte hai aap?
Customer: Hello. Problem mai already tumhara hai na wo jo usko mai bola na.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Kya bataya tha sir aapko bataiye.
Customer: Pehle hamara problem.
Executive: Kya kya bol rahe sir sorry ek baar fir se boliyega aap?
Customer: Hamara company hai.
Executive: Haan aapka company jo registered hai Dairy Tech Solution Private Limited. Thik hai sir?
Customer: Haan wo renewal ka thoda problem.
Executive: To renewal to aapne already kar rakha hai sir aur aapke jo service ka last date hai na sir jaise January se start hai to January se hi onward extend hua hai sir aur aapka jo service ka last date hai na sir wo 8 January 2027 ka hai sir. Next time aap jab bhi renewal karaiyega na to apna January mein hi karaiyega. Aapko team ne isliye bataya tha sir kyunki aapka jo service hai na sir same service ka jo price hai na wo IndiaMART ka sir increase ho gaya hai sir. Aapke pass notification bhi aa raha hoga sir. Aap khud bhi wahan se bhi check kar sakte hai.
Customer: Yes yes call de raha hu.
Executive: Sorry sir.
(silence)
Executive: Taangalude call hold cheythirikkunnu. Linenil thudaruka. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Taangalude call hold cheythirikkunnu. Linenil thudaruka. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Taangalude call hold cheythirikkunnu. Linenil thudaruka. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Taangalude call hold cheythirikkunnu. Linenil thudaruka. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane.
Hello.
Customer: Haan haan bolo sir.
Executive: Haan ji sir to uske liye aap nishchint rahiye sir aapki jo services hai na next time jo aapka renewal process hoga.
Customer: Gaurav ne bhi ek mail dal diya wo mail abhi tak dekha nahi hai.
Executive: Aap bataiye to main aapko service ka end date wagera sari cheeze over to mail karwa du sir aapko?
Customer: Nahi already Gaurav bola tha wo ek mail sending kiya but main dekha nahi hai mail.
Executive: Kya mail aapko send kiya tha?
Executive: Aapka invoice wagera bhijwa du sir last date ke according sari cheeze mail pe karwa du aapko main?
Customer: Aisa nahi hai wo tumhara problem hai abhi mere mein do months before mein main renewal kiya iska problem kya hai hamara company bola tha iska option kya hai hum hamara mana kiya.
Executive: Haan haan.
Executive: Isliye hamara.
Executive: Achha matlab do mahine pehle aapne renewal process kara diya tha apne renewal ke time se pehle.
Customer: Audi Audi ka chalta kya business hai hamara ek do tumhara company mein hamara dead investment hai.
Executive: Achha achha.
Customer: Isliye hamara problem.
Executive: Achha achha to chaliye sir koi issue nahi hai sir agar aapne apna renewal generate hone ke baad aapne karwaya tha na sir time se pehle aapne karwaya hai to aisa nahi hai ki jo aapka bacha hua time hai sir wo aapka loss hoga sir. Jitna aapka time bacha hua tha na sir utna se hi aage aapki services se continue hogi. To jaise aapka service hai sir January se chal raha tha to January se January hi chalega sir. Na ki aapne agar October mein apna renewal process kiya hai to October mein hoga. Isiliye main aapko keh raha hu sir hamari jo call bhi baat ho rahi hai na sir ye bhi hamara sir recorded line mein ho raha hai. Aur agar aap chahte hai to main aapko sare details aapko over to main mail pe bhi bhijwa dunga ki next time jo bhi aapka renewal process hoga na sir aapka jo service ka last date hai sir wo 8 January 2027 ka hai sir. To aap apna renewal next time agar process karte hai to 8 January 2027 mein hi aapko karna hoga.
Customer: Okay okay main main understand hai hamara previous ka renewal date kaunsa date mein hai?
Executive: Previous matlab sir?
Customer: Pehle ka.
Customer: Haan pehle ka renewal date kaunsa date mein hai?
Executive: Sir ek minute main aapko check kar leta hu ki last time aapne payment kab proceed kiya tha just one minute sir.
Executive: Last time ne jo aapne payment proceed kiya tha na IndiaMART par sir net banking ke through 3 January 2025.
Customer: 2024?
Executive: 3rd January 2025.
Hello.
Customer: 2024 mein ek payment kiya na.
Executive: 20 December 2024.
Customer: 20 December.
Executive: Yes sir.
Customer: 20 December mein nahi hai sir.
Executive: 3rd January 2025 ka net banking 3rd January 2025.
Customer: Mere ko uska wo dono ka bill share karo na.
Executive: Okay sir I am sharing bill India IndiaMART mein available hai.
Executive: Yes yes sir I have already shared sir over your registered mail ID sir please check sir. I am confirming the mail ID sir. Dairy Tech Solution Dairy Tech Market@gmail.com sir.
Customer: Haan usme nahi hai Dairy Tech Solution@gmail.com.
Executive: Sir abhi to wahi hai aap bolo to main aapko download karke dono ka tax invoice over to WhatsApp share kar du ye number agar aapke WhatsApp pe available hai to.
Customer: Okay okay WhatsApp WhatsApp mein share karo.
Executive: Thik hai main abhi aapko WhatsApp pe na dono tax invoice aapko main over to WhatsApp aapko main share karwa de raha hu thik hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aur koi issue hai sir?
Customer: Nahi hai wo okay share karne ke baad mein discuss karta hu.
Executive: Thik hai main aapko na dono ka tax invoice over to WhatsApp pe aapke account manager se abhi share karwa raha hu thik hai? Aap usko check kijiye sir fir main aapko call kar sakta hu sir.
Customer: Okay sir okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer had issues with renewal date.

- Customer wants previous bills.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the renewal process.

- Executive confirmed the last date of service.

- Executive agreed to share tax invoices on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check the tax invoices.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- renewal, tax invoice, service date
